result.def: Data structure is a particular way of storing and organizing data in a computer memory so that it can be used efficiently

result.td1: These are basic structures directly operated upon by the machine instructions.
result.td2: Data types such as integer, real, character & Boolean are known as primitive data structures. These cannot be grouped.

result.td1: It emphasize on structuring of a group of data items, according to their relationship.
result.td2: According to the nature of memory size, it will be further classified as
